title: Words and Pictures 2013 DVDR ENG R4 NTSC
description:
In a secondary school, starts a war between two teachers: Jack Marcus, successful writer and professor of literature, and Dina Delsanto, painter and professor of fine arts. While he believes that words are more important than the pictures, she asserts the supremacy of photos and paintings. As the clash of the two transforms into romance, students try to figure out which language is the most important ..
